text: Bolgar () is the name of several inhabited localities in the Republic of Tatarstan, Russia. ;Urban localities *Bolgar, Spassky District, Republic of Tatarstan, a town in Spassky District, ;Rural localities *Bolgar, Nizhnekamsky District, Republic of Tatarstan, a selo in Nizhnekamsky District,
title: Bolgar (inhabited locality)
